gate.plugin.corpusstats

Class CorpusStatsCollocationsPR

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.util.AbstractFeatureBearer
      • gate.creole.AbstractResource
        • gate.creole.AbstractProcessingResource
          • gate.creole.AbstractLanguageAnalyser
            • gate.api.AbstractDocumentProcessor
              • gate.plugin.corpusstats.CorpusStatsCollocationsPR
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gate.creole.ANNIEConstants, gate.creole.ControllerAwarePR, gate.Executable, gate.LanguageAnalyser, gate.ProcessingResource, gate.Resource, gate.util.Benchmarkable, gate.util.FeatureBearer, gate.util.NameBearer, Serializable

    @CreoleResource(name="CorpusStatsCollocationsPR",
                helpURL="https://gatenlp.github.io/gateplugin-CorpusStats/doc-CorpusStatsCollocationsPR",
                comment="Calculate pairwise statistics like PMI")
public class CorpusStatsCollocationsPR
extends AbstractDocumentProcessor

      • setReuseExisting

        @RunTime
 @Optional
 @CreoleParameter(comment="Should any existing stats data be loaded and reused?",
                 defaultValue="false")
public void setReuseExisting(Boolean val)
        Whether or not to load any existing stats data before processing. If set to true and the binary data file already exists, it is loaded before processing starts and the counts for the run are added to that data. If the binary data file does not exist, the TSV files are loaded, if they exist.

        NOTE: If a pipeline is run several times in a row, the stats are being reset to zero between runs if reuseExisting is false.

        Parameters:
        val - TODO

      • getReuseExisting

        public Boolean getReuseExisting()

      • process

        protected gate.Document process(gate.Document document)
        Description copied from class: AbstractDocumentProcessor
        The new method to implement by PRs which derive from this class. This must return a document which will usually be the same object as it was passed. NOTE: in the future the better option here may be to return Optional of Document or even List of Document. That way downstream PRs could be made to not process filtered documents and to process additional generated documents.
        Specified by:
        process in class AbstractDocumentProcessor
        Parameters:
        document - the document to get processed
        Returns:
        the processed document, usually identical to the one passed

      • loadTfFile

        protected void loadTfFile(Map<String,Double> term2tf)
        Load a list of term frequencies for term 1. If a tf file is specified then a term1 is only considered at all if the tf found for it is at least the specified mintf.
        Parameters:
        term2tf - a pre-allocated map from term to frequency which will get filled

      • beforeFirstDocument

        protected void beforeFirstDocument(gate.Controller ctrl)
        Description copied from class: AbstractDocumentProcessor
        Method that runs before the first document is being processed by a controller. This method is not called if no documents are processed at all.
        Specified by:
        beforeFirstDocument in class AbstractDocumentProcessor
        Parameters:
        ctrl - the controller that is going to be run on the documents

        Description copied from class: AbstractDocumentProcessor
        Method that runs after the last Document is run by that controller. This method is not called if there are no documents.
        Specified by:
        afterLastDocument in class AbstractDocumentProcessor
        Parameters:
        ctrl - the controller that has been run
        t - any throwable if an error occurred, otherwise null
